item.description: I just released v4.0.0 of Betterer ğŸ‰ (now with sweet new docs!) and it has a bunch of simplified APIs for writing tests. And just before I shipped it, I got an issue asking how to write a Stylelint test, so let's do it here and explain it line by line:
